title: REQUIRE(y.sum().toCFloat() < 130) is flaky
body_html:
15:54:16 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/test/cpp/api/container.cpp:217: FAILED:
15:54:16   REQUIRE( y.sum().toCFloat() < 130 )
15:54:16 with expansion:
15:54:16   130.0f < 130

The test, by its nature, seems to be flaky. Maybe there is a better statistical test you can grab from PyTorch's test suite.

CC @ebetica @goldsborough
